name: 3Cs Coordination Software
description: Platform for distributed communities. Connect, reach consensus, coordinate action.
longDescription: 3Cs is the coordination layer for intentional communities and distributed teams. It helps groups connect (shared understanding), reach consensus (collective decision-making), and coordinate action (execution). You'd work on the architecture, UX, and integrations that make coordination feel natural instead of bureaucratic.
why: If you care about how groups make decisions together and want to solve a real bottleneck in community work, this is it.

name: Everything Stack
description: AI-native framework. Voice interfaces, workflow orchestration, ambient AI.
longDescription: Everything Stack is how we build AI-native applications—where AI isn't a chatbot you talk to, it's ambient intelligence that helps you work. You'd collaborate on voice interfaces, multi-step workflows, and integrations that make AI feel like a natural extension of how you think.
why: If you're curious about how AI can augment human thinking (not replace it), this is where we explore that.

name: Food Forest
description: Regenerative food systems. Permaculture design, sustainable living.
longDescription: Food Forest is our long-term bet on regenerative food systems—designing and implementing permaculture principles on the land. You'd work on the design, maintenance, and knowledge systems that make food production resilient and abundant.
why: If you're interested in food systems and want to see regenerative agriculture work in practice, this is how.
